name: Tele Raider
description:
Tele Raider is a speedrunning challenge game made for ScoreSpace Speedjam #1. 

Embark on a thrilling adventure as a treasure raider, tasked with stealing priceless gems from an ancient cave system filled with treacherous obstacles and monstrous creatures. With daunting challenges at every turn, success seems nearly impossible. However, armed with cutting-edge technology, you possess a remarkable teleportation device that can instantly transport you across the room, giving you the edge you need to achieve your goal. Can you use your skills and cunning to outsmart the dangers that lie ahead and emerge victorious with the precious treasure in hand?

Controls

A / DMove left and rightMouseUse the mouse cursor to aim.
Hold left button to charge tele-ball, release to shoot.

Credits

  • Programming: Berndtzl
  • Graphics: Kenney 1-bit pack
  • Background art by Liul Cthulhu
  • Cover Image by Midjourney
  • Music by Matthew Pablo
